name: You Will Not Survive
description:
Made for the Can You Survive this Jam? game jam in less than 24 hours. I was unfortunately late to the party and with only 24 hours to spare I present to you this mess. I am not responsible for you throwing your keyboard at the wall after being instantly killed for the hundredth time trying to get to the key. I do however apologize for how unforgiving the monsters and demons of You Will Not Survive are. I wish you luck and thank you for playing!

Special thanks to the DSR squad,  and everyone that supports my games.  🐺
